Package tools.general

General tools classes and methods for content manipulation / optimization

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Base64 A Base64 Encoder/Decoder.
ClassPathLoader Tricky methods to enrich java path and libraries on runtime Pretty dirty (magic ? ;-) )
Compressor Class providing various methods to optimize HTML size.

All methods can be called statically.
ExtendedByteArrayOutputStream This class implements an output stream in which the data is written into a byte array.
JavaRtCompiler Class used to dynamically compile and load Java classes Let's go with some magic in Java
MimeMagic Class trying to extract MIME type and encoding for given content
Provides a simple implementation of MimeMagic function based on magic.mime used by UNIX file command and Apache MimeMagic module
TODO: support all operators (only EQUALS supported for now) TODO: implements ENCODING if provided in magic.mime file
MimeMagic.MimeMagicMatcher MimeMagic Rule
 

Enum Summary
MimeMagic.MimeMagicMatcher.OPERATOR List of possible operators used in MimeMagic file
MimeMagic.MIMEMAGICTYPE MAGIC matchers types
